channel.title: Need help with sever
channel.description:
Ok i have 3 problems 1: when people wear d chain they go invisable can anyone tell me how to fix that??
2: second problem is that when people wear guthans pl8 they to go invisable
3: people cannot trade when you bring up the trade screen and ioffer lets say (blue p hat) it changes to watering cans so anything you offer changes to watering cans and says the oppasite person is offering a d chain where they not
plz can people help me out =]
